sub_goal: You take the clean blue socks.

You are in the corridor. In one part of the room you see a key holder that has a clean blue socks on it. There is also a shoe cabinet that is closed. You also see a umbrella stand, that has nothing on it. In another part of the room you see a hat rack, that has nothing on it. In one part of the room you see a coat hanger, that has nothing on it. There is also a clean white panties.
